akn:section.akn:heading: Prohibition of loans, guarantees, and insurance as to sales of defense articles or services

akn:content.akn:p: § 635n. Prohibition of loans, guarantees, and insurance as to sales of defense articles or services The Bank shall not extend loans, guarantees, or insurance under this subchapter in connection with the sale of defense articles or defense services. (Pub. L. 90–390, § 5, July 7, 1968, 82 Stat. 297.)
